website_summaries.verdict: The Terrex AX3 Mid GTX from Adidas receives a lot of love from outdoorsy individuals for providing excellent trail-centric benefits, such as waterproofness and comfort. It also gains approval by supplying ample traction and ankle support. However, buyers who had to shell out extra bucks weren’t pleased.All in all, the Adidas Terrex AX3 Mid GTX prevails in necessary aspects to help outdoor lovers perform in their adventures.
pros: Many owners state that the Adidas Terrex AX3 Mid GTX’s Gore-Tex liner is successful in keeping water out
Most buyers find it an immensely-comfortable hiking boot
Several outdoor enthusiasts applaud its Continental outsole for giving enough grip
It impresses a bunch of purchasers by delivering sufficient ankle support
According to a couple of consumer reviews, this footgear can be used straight out of the box, thanks to its virtually non-existent break-in period
cons: Some shoppers claim that the Adidas Terrex AX3 Mid GTX is an expensive purchase
The hiking boot’s lace is too short, based on a buyer’s opinion

customer_reviews.title: For me, there has been a fundamental design change..
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 pairs of size 8 (42) Adidas Terrex A3 shoes, 2 x Mid GTX 1 x Mid non GTX and 2 x sports shoes.. all fir me perfectly, which is why have so many and have used them almost constantly since 2013.. The 'design' of these shoes looks identical, but the foot volume has dramatically reduced to an extent that I could not get my foot into the shoe and lace it because there is insufficient material to cover my foot.. both shoes, so not a production fault. Such a huge disappointment.. and to add a bit of insult I had to pay £14.00 to return them..
customer_reviews.author: Martin J Rush

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Walking Boots
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly comfortable, snug and waterproof. Stylish too! I normally go half size up in Adidas, but I went a whole size up in these, to allow for thick walking socks. They fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: N. French

customer_reviews.title: Nice, lightweight boots
customer_reviews.text: No dislikes so far, seem to be waterproof and sturdy and are still lightweight I've got some expensive boots that are waterproof but there so heavy your feet end up aching after a short walk these thankfully don't do that.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is way off
customer_reviews.text: Great looking boots and super lightweight but sizing is way off . I've never had bigger than size 11 and I'm more like 10 and a half, I ordered these in 11 and a half and still way to tight and really narrow .
customer_reviews.author: johnyforgemaster

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery and product as described
customer_reviews.text: Well impressed with delivery, i ordered on the 2nd and they were due on the 11th October but came today on the 4th 👍 Also as other reviews say order a size bigger, I ordered a half a size bigger and they fit perfectly 👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Order a size up from normal.
customer_reviews.text: Sizing does come up small/ narrow. Having read reviews and purchased Adidas boots previously, I decided to order one size up- and they fit perfectly on width and length. Tried the boots indoors and seem like they will be very comfortable on a long walk. They are sturdy in terms of ankle support, which was a key feature for me.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Good quality boots
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my dad and he loves them very comfy and perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Laura Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Happy new boots
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a light weight goretex boot for everyday use these fit the bill 👌
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Really comfy but order a half size up
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable and felt like socks by the end of the first 13 mile walk. Word of warning though, order a half size up. I've always bought a 10 in any shoe with no problems. I had to send a 10 back because they were just too 'snug' a 10 1/2 fits perfectly and one of the comfiest walking boots in this price range that I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Davies

customer_reviews.title: Nice snug fit boot
customer_reviews.text: Nice snug fit and not to bulky compared to other walking boots although denfinetly required at least half a size larger as most people recomend.....will see how things go
customer_reviews.author: Starman

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Stiffer and slightly heavier than expected. Very narrow fit, I purchased a size larger than usual but still could of done with an extra half size up. Returned item and had to pay a £14 for postage. Definatley better products out there for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is way off
customer_reviews.text: I am a UK11 and ordered a UK12 as this is what is recommended at the top of the page. This UK12 fit is more like a UK 9 - ridiculous, I then had to return this item to Germany which cost me £22
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: They are very narrow! Order size UP !
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews, I ordered a size up of my regular size. Fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Stanislav Mujgos

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Nice and comfortable. Just remember to buy one size larger. I normally wear 11-11.5. Ordered 12 but the 12.5 would`ve been ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Konrad Mroczek

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Terrex Ax3 Mid GTX Fitness Shoes
product_meta.description: Conquer any trail with confidence and safety. This mountain boot is designed to advance on abrupt and rugged terrain. Breathable and waterproof GORE-TEX membrane keeps feet dry. High wear resistance rubber outsole provides excellent traction on dry and wet soil.
